title: Part (a)ii
stimulusHtml:
The response earns one point for a valid equation that is consistent with (a)i, includes the conservation of momentum, includes the speed of each cart after they recoil, and is conceptually relevant to the procedure described in part (b).

Example Response:

Σ p → 0 =Σ p → f p X0 + p Y0 = p X0 + p Y0 m X v X0 + m Y v Y0 = m X v Xf + m Y v Yf 0= m X v Xf + m Y v Yf

Quantities “ m X ” and “ m Y ” represent the masses of the respective cart-bar systems and “ v fX ” and “ v fY ” represent the final velocities of the respective cart-bar systems.
descriptions: Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.
